verses.text: \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* a \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w feast|strong="H3900"\w* to a \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w* of his \w lords|strong="H7261"\w*, and \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* the \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w*.

\w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w*, whiles he \w tasted|strong="H2942"\w* the \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0858"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* which his \w father|strong="H0002"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* had \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* which \add was\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; that the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H7261"\w*, his \w wives|strong="H7695"\w*, and his \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*, might \w drink|strong="H8355"\w* therein.\f + \fr 5.2 \ft father: or, grandfather\f*\f + \fr 5.2 \ft taken: Chaldee, brought forth\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* they \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* that were \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add was\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; and the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and his \w princes|strong="H7261"\w*, his \w wives|strong="H7695"\w*, and his \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*, \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* in them.

They \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, and \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, and of \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, of \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, of \w wood|strong="H0636"\w*, and of \w stone|strong="H0069"\w*.

¶ In the same \w hour|strong="H8160"\w* came \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* \w fingers|strong="H0677"\w* of a \w man’s|strong="H0606"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, and \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* over \w against|strong="H6903"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H5043"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w plaister|strong="H1528"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H3797"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* the \w part|strong="H6447"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* that \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* was \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*, and his \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* him, so that the \w joints|strong="H7001"\w* of his \w loins|strong="H2783"\w* were \w loosed|strong="H8271"\w*, and his \w knees|strong="H0755"\w* \w smote|strong="H5368"\w* \w one|strong="H1668"\w* against \w another|strong="H1668"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft countenance: Chaldee, brightnesses\f*\f + \fr 5.6 \ft was changed: Chaldee, changed it\f*\f + \fr 5.6 \ft joints: or, girdles: Chaldee, bindings, or, knots\f*

The \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w cried|strong="H7123"\w* \w aloud|strong="H2429"\w* to \w bring|strong="H5954"\w* in the \w astrologers|strong="H0826"\w*, the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, and the \w soothsayers|strong="H1505"\w*. \add And\add* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* to the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="H0606"\w* shall \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, and \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, shall be \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* with \w scarlet|strong="H0711"\w*, and \add have\add* a \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* his \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, and shall be the \w third|strong="H8523"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.\f + \fr 5.7 \ft aloud: Chaldee, with might\f*\f + \fr 5.7 \ft scarlet: or, purple\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* in \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men:\add* but they \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, nor make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7690"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w*, and his \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* was \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* in \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, and his \w lords|strong="H7261"\w* were \w astonied|strong="H7672"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft countenance: Chaldee, brightnesses\f*

¶ \add Now\add* the \w queen|strong="H4433"\w*, by \w reason|strong="H6903"\w* of the \w words|strong="H4406"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* and his \w lords|strong="H7261"\w*, \w came|strong="H5954"\w* into the \w banquet|strong="H4961"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*: \add and\add* the \w queen|strong="H4433"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*: let \w not|strong="H0409"\w* thy \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w trouble|strong="H0927"\w* thee, nor let thy \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* be \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*:

There \w is|strong="H0383"\w* a \w man|strong="H1400"\w* in thy \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, in whom \add is\add* the \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*; and in the \w days|strong="H3118"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w* \w light|strong="H5094"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w* and \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w*, like the \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* of the \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, was \w found|strong="H7912"\w* in him; whom the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \add I say\add*, thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, \w made|strong="H6966"\w* \w master|strong="H7229"\w* of the \w magicians|strong="H2749"\w*, \w astrologers|strong="H0826"\w*, \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, \add and\add* \w soothsayers|strong="H1505"\w*;\f + \fr 5.11 \ft father: or, grandfather\f*

Forasmuch \w as|strong="H6903"\w* an \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w*, and \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w*, and \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w*, \w interpreting|strong="H6590"\w* of \w dreams|strong="H2493"\w*, and \w shewing|strong="H0263"\w* of hard \w sentences|strong="H0280"\w*, and \w dissolving|strong="H8271"\w* of \w doubts|strong="H7001"\w*, were \w found|strong="H7912"\w* in the same \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w named|strong="H7761"\w* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*: \w now|strong="H3705"\w* let \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* be \w called|strong="H7123"\w*, and he will \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.\f + \fr 5.12 \ft interpreting: or, of an interpreter\f*\f + \fr 5.12 \ft dissolving: or, of a dissolver\f*\f + \fr 5.12 \ft doubts: Chaldee, knots\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* brought \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*. \add And\add* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \add Art\add* \w thou|strong="H0607"\w* that \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, which \add art\add* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w children|strong="H1123"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1547"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* my \w father|strong="H0002"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Jewry|strong="H3061"\w*?\f + \fr 5.13 \ft father: or, grandfather\f*

I have even \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* of thee, that the \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* of the \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \add is\add* in \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, and \add that\add* \w light|strong="H5094"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w* and \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* is \w found|strong="H7912"\w* in thee.

And \w now|strong="H3705"\w* the \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \add men\add*, the \w astrologers|strong="H0826"\w*, have been \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* in \w before|strong="H6925"\w* me, that they should \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, and make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* unto me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof: but they \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w shew|strong="H2324"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* of the \w thing|strong="H4406"\w*:

And \w I|strong="H0576"\w* have \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* of \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, that thou \w canst|strong="H3202"\w* \w make|strong="H6590"\w* \w interpretations|strong="H6591"\w*, and \w dissolve|strong="H8271"\w* \w doubts|strong="H7001"\w*: \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* thou \w canst|strong="H3202"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, and make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to me the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, thou shalt be \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* with \w scarlet|strong="H0711"\w*, and \add have\add* a \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, and shalt be the \w third|strong="H8531"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.\f + \fr 5.16 \ft make interpretations: Chaldee, interpret, etc\f*

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, Let thy \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* to thyself, and \w give|strong="H3052"\w* thy \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* to \w another|strong="H0321"\w*; \w yet|strong="H1297"\w* I will \w read|strong="H7123"\w* the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and make \w known|strong="H3046"\w* to him the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.\f + \fr 5.17 \ft rewards: or, fee\f*

O \w thou|strong="H0607"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, the most \w high|strong="H5943"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w* a \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, and \w majesty|strong="H7238"\w*, and \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H1923"\w*:

And \w for|strong="H4481"\w* the \w majesty|strong="H7238"\w* that he \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* him, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, and \w languages|strong="H3961"\w*, \w trembled|strong="H1934"\w* and \w feared|strong="H1763"\w* \w before|strong="H4481"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*: whom he \w would|strong="H1934"\w* he \w slew|strong="H1934"\w*; and whom he \w would|strong="H1934"\w* he kept \w alive|strong="H1934"\w*; and whom he \w would|strong="H1934"\w* he set \w up|strong="H1934"\w*; and whom he \w would|strong="H1934"\w* he put \w down|strong="H1934"\w*.

But when his \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* was lifted \w up|strong="H7313"\w*, and his \w mind|strong="H7308"\w* \w hardened|strong="H8631"\w* in \w pride|strong="H2103"\w*, he was \w deposed|strong="H5182"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* his \w kingly|strong="H4437"\w* \w throne|strong="H3764"\w*, and they \w took|strong="H5709"\w* his \w glory|strong="H3367"\w* from \w him|strong="H4481"\w*:\f + \fr 5.20 \ft in pride: or, to deal proudly\f*\f + \fr 5.20 \ft deposed: Chaldee, made to come down\f*

And he was \w driven|strong="H2957"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1123"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*; and his \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* was \w made|strong="H7739"\w* \w like|strong="H5974"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, and his \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* \add was\add* with the wild \w asses|strong="H6167"\w*: they \w fed|strong="H2939"\w* him with \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* like \w oxen|strong="H8450"\w*, and his \w body|strong="H1655"\w* was \w wet|strong="H6647"\w* with the \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*; \w till|strong="H5705"\w* he \w knew|strong="H3046"\w* that the most \w high|strong="H5943"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w ruled|strong="H7990"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* of \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, and \add that\add* he \w appointeth|strong="H6966"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* it \w whomsoever|strong="H4479"\w* he \w will|strong="H6634"\w*.\f + \fr 5.21 \ft his heart…: or, he made his heart equal, etc\f*

And \w thou|strong="H0607"\w* his \w son|strong="H1247"\w*, O \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w*, hast \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w humbled|strong="H8214"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3825"\w*, \w though|strong="H6903"\w* thou \w knewest|strong="H3046"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w*;

But hast lifted \w up|strong="H7313"\w* thyself \w against|strong="H5922"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H4756"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*; and they have \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* thee, and \w thou|strong="H0607"\w*, and thy \w lords|strong="H7261"\w*, thy \w wives|strong="H7695"\w*, and thy \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*, have \w drunk|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w* in them; and thou hast \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, and \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, of \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, \w wood|strong="H0636"\w*, and \w stone|strong="H0069"\w*, which \w see|strong="H2370"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w hear|strong="H8086"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w*: and the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* in whose \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* thy \w breath|strong="H5396"\w* \add is\add*, and whose \add are\add* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H0735"\w*, hast thou \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w glorified|strong="H1922"\w*:

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* was the \w part|strong="H6447"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*; and \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* was \w written|strong="H7560"\w*.

¶ And \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \add is\add* the \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* that was \w written|strong="H7560"\w*, \w MENE|strong="H4484"\w*, \w MENE|strong="H4484"\w*, \w TEKEL|strong="H8625"\w*, \w UPHARSIN|strong="H6537"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \add is\add* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* of the \w thing|strong="H4406"\w*: \w MENE|strong="H4484"\w*; \w God|strong="H0426"\w* hath \w numbered|strong="H4483"\w* thy \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, and \w finished|strong="H8000"\w* it.
\w TEKEL|strong="H8625"\w*; Thou art \w weighed|strong="H8625"\w* in the \w balances|strong="H3977"\w*, and art \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w wanting|strong="H2627"\w*.
\w PERES|strong="H6537"\w*; Thy \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* is \w divided|strong="H6537"\w*, and \w given|strong="H3052"\w* to the \w Medes|strong="H4076"\w* and \w Persians|strong="H6540"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w*, and they \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* with \w scarlet|strong="H0711"\w*, and \add put\add* a \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* his \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, and made a \w proclamation|strong="H3745"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* him, that he should \w be|strong="H1934"\w* the \w third|strong="H8531"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7990"\w* in the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.
¶ In that \w night|strong="H3916"\w* was \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w* \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*.

And \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* the \w Median|strong="H4077"\w* \w took|strong="H6902"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \add being\add* about \w threescore|strong="H8361"\w* and \w two|strong="H8648"\w* \w years|strong="H8140"\w* \w old|strong="H1247"\w*.\f + \fr 5.31 \ft being…: Chaldee, he as the son of, etc\f*\f + \fr 5.31 \ft about: or, now\f*
